Name: ReleaseMMU
Author: Felix Gaisbauer
LongDescription: A release MMU realized using motion blending.
ShortDescription: A release MMU which models the release of an object.

Parameters.Name: Hand
Parameters.Description: The hand of the release motion

Parameters.Name: Velocity
Parameters.Description: The max velocity of the release motion

Parameters.Name: AngularVelocity
Parameters.Description: The max angular velocity of the release motion

Parameters.Name: EndBlendDuration
Parameters.Description: The duration of the blending that is performed after the ik reached the goal (smooth transition)

Parameters.Name: UseBlending
Parameters.Description: Specifies whether motion blending is used for modeling the release motion (by default false)

Parameters.Name: Trajectory
Parameters.Description: An optional velocity for the release motion
